org.mt4j.sceneManagement

Interface Iscene

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITransition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScene, AbstractTransition, AirHockeyScene, AirHockeyScene, BlendTransition, ChooseBackgroundScene, CommonsExampleScene, CraniumSceneManager, CssExampleScene, DrawOverlay, DrawSurfaceScene, DummyScene, Extension3DScene, FadeTransition, FiducialScene, FlickrScene, FlipTransition, FluidSimulationScene, FluidSimulationScene, GenericExampleScene, HelloWorldScene, IntegrationTestApp, MainDrawingScene, MainDrawingScene, MapsScene, MenuExampleScene, Models3DScene, Models3DScene, MTGesturesExampleScene, MTJFreeChartExampleScene, MTRadialMenuExampleScene, MTShellScene, PDFExampleScene, PhysicsScene, PhysicsScene, PictureBrowser, PuzzleScene, PuzzleScene, Scene1, Scene2, Scene3, Sfondo, SimpleLayoutTestSceneScene, SlideTransition, Space3DScene, Space3DScene, SVGScene, SwingIntegrationScene, TestApp, TouchTailScene, TouchTailScene

    public interface Iscene
    The Interface Iscene. Represents a scene in a program.
    Author:
    Christopher Ruff

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean destroy()
      Destroy the scene.
      void drawAndUpdate(processing.core.PGraphics graphics, long timeDelta)
      Draw and update.
      MTCanvas getCanvas()
      Gets the main canvas.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the scene.
      Icamera getSceneCam()
      Gets the scene cam.
      ITransition getTransition()
      Gets the transition.
      void onEnter()
      Is invoked on a scene just before it is set to be the currently active scene.
      void onLeave()
      Gets called on the current scene just before the current scene becomes inactive in favor of another scene.
      void registerPreDrawAction(IPreDrawAction action)
      Shedule a action to be processed before the next drawing.
